title: The Taste of Apple Seeds
overview: When Bertha dies, her granddaughter Iris inherits her house and finds herself back in the home where she and her cousin used to play dressing-up in the summer holidays. While she wanders from room to room, she gropes her way through memories and things she had forgotten: What did her grandfather really do before he went to war? Which men were Berthaâ€™s daughters in love with? Who ate his apple with the seeds?
